title: Expo mobile app
description: Create apps/mobile as the Expo mobile application with Expo Router file-based routing, Uniwind for Tailwind-style utility classes, and React Native Reusables configuration. Includes package.json (@nutricodex/mobile with expo, expo-router, react-native, uniwind, convex, better-auth, and all other dependencies), app.json (Expo config with NutriCodex name, iOS/Android platforms, plugins), tsconfig.json (extends react-native.json), metro.config.js (withUniwindConfig for Taiwlind CSS processing), babel.config.js (Expo preset), src/global.css (Tailwind + Uniwind imports), app/_layout.tsx (root layout with ConvexProvider and PortalHost), app/index.tsx (placeholder home screen), and src/lib/auth-client.ts (Better Auth client with Expo plugin, SecureStore, convexClient).
acceptance_criteria: apps/mobile/package.json has name @nutricodex/mobile, main set to expo-router/entry, scripts for start/dev/android/ios/lint/type-check

Dependencies include expo, expo-router, expo-secure-store, expo-status-bar, react, react-native, convex, @nutricodex/backend workspace:*, @convex-dev/better-auth, better-auth 1.4.9, @better-auth/expo 1.4.9, uniwind, tailwindcss, react-native-reanimated, react-native-safe-area-context, react-native-screens, @rn-primitives/portal, clsx, tailwind-merge, class-variance-authority
app.json configures expo with name NutriCodex, slug nutricodex, platforms [ios, android], scheme nutricodex, bundleIdentifier, plugins for expo-router and expo-secure-store
tsconfig.json extends @nutricodex/typescript-config/react-native.json with path alias @/* mapping to ./*
metro.config.js uses getDefaultConfig and wraps with withUniwindConfig pointing to src/global.css
app/_layout.tsx creates ConvexProvider with ConvexReactClient and wraps Slot, includes PortalHost and global.css import
app/index.tsx renders a minimal placeholder screen with NutriCodex text
src/lib/auth-client.ts creates auth client with expoClient plugin (SecureStore, scheme) and convexClient plugin
